env.info: (plate 0) (at 0 2) (sort 1 human) (size 1 big) (at 1 1) (sort 2 table) (size 2 big) (at 2 2) (sort 3 refrigerator) (size 3 big) (at 3 3) (type 3 container) (opened 3) (sort 4 television) (size 4 big) (at 4 4) (sort 5 microwave) (size 5 big) (at 5 5) (type 5 container) (closed 5) (sort 6 bed) (size 6 big) (at 6 6) (sort 7 teapoy) (size 7 big) (at 7 7) (sort 8 teapoy) (size 8 big) (at 8 8) (sort 9 bottle) (size 9 small) (color 9 green) (sort 10 bottle) (size 10 small) (color 10 green) (sort 11 remotecontrol) (size 11 small) (color 11 white) (sort 12 can) (size 12 small) (color 12 green) (sort 13 cup) (size 13 small) (color 13 blue) (sort 14 remotecontrol) (size 14 small) (color 14 yellow) (sort 15 remotecontrol) (size 15 small) (color 15 black) (hold 15) (sort 16 book) (size 16 small) (color 16 yellow) (sort 17 book) (size 17 small) (color 17 black)

test.instr: (:ins (:task (putin X Y) (:cond (sort X remotecontrol) (sort Y refrigerator))) (:task (pickup X) (:cond (sort X remotecontrol) (color X yellow))) (:task (putdown X) (:cond (sort X can))) (:cons_not (:task (puton X Y) (:cond (color X yellow) (sort X remotecontrol) (sort Y teapoy)))) (:cons_notnot (:info (opened X) (:cond (sort X refrigerator)))) )
test.nl: Put a remotecontrol in the refrigerator. Pick up the yellow remotecontrol. Put down the can. The yellow remotecontrol is not put on the reapoy. The refrigerator must be opened.
